Source.Name: cython
Source.Description: Cython is an optimising static compiler for Python and Cython, making writing C extensions for Python as easy as Python itself. It allows you to write callbacks from and to C or C++ natively, tune Python into C performance, work efficiently with large datasets, and more.

Package.Name: cython
Package.Description: Cython is an optimising static compiler for Python and Cython, making writing C extensions for Python as easy as Python itself. It allows you to write callbacks from and to C or C++ natively, tune Python into C performance, work efficiently with large datasets, and more.
